SELECT DISTINCT l.LAB_ID , l.BOARD_ID , l.LAB_NAME , l.LAB_NAME_DESC , l.DESC_DETAIL , l.CREATE_DATE , l.MODIFY_DATE , (SELECT PREPARATION FROM LAB_DETAIL_INGREDIENT WHERE LAB_ID = l.LAB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) PREPARATION , (SELECT COOKINGTIME FROM LAB_DETAIL_INGREDIENT WHERE LAB_ID = l.LAB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) COOKINGTIME , ( SELECT FILE_PATH FROM IMG_LIST il WHERE il.POST_ID = l.LAB_ID AND il.BOARD_ID = l.BOARD_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 AND IMG_PRIORITY = 1 ) AS POSTER FROM LAB l left outer join IMG_LIST i ON l.LAB_ID = i.POST_ID AND l.BOARD_ID = i.BOARD_ID
and l.LAB_ID != #{searchMap.labId}

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT l.*, DECODE(i.img_priority, 1, i.file_path) AS poster, LISTAGG(distinct CASE WHEN i.img_priority != 1 THEN i.file_path END, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY i.img_priority) OVER (PARTITION BY i.post_id) AS files FROM lab l inner JOIN img_list i ON l.lab_id = i.post_ID AND l.board_id = i.board_id where l.lab_id = #{lab_id} order by l.lab_id DESC ) a WHERE a.poster IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT LAB_PRIORITY , LAB_INGREDIENT_NAME , SERVINGS , PREPARATION , COOKINGTIME , LISTAGG(LAB_INGREDIENT_DETAIL, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY LAB_PRIORITY) OVER (PARTITION BY LAB_PRIORITY) AS COOKS FROM LAB_DETAIL_INGREDIENT WHERE LAB_ID = #{lab_id} order by lab_priority

WITH HASHTABLES AS ( SELECT hc.CONN_ID , hc.BOARD_ID , h.HASH_ID , h.HASH_NAME FROM HASHTAGS_CONN hc INNER JOIN HASHTAGS h ON hc.HASH_ID = h.HASH_ID ) SELECT DISTINCT l.* , LISTAGG(DISTINCT h.hash_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY h.hash_id) OVER(PARTITION BY l.lab_id) AS hashnames , ( SELECT FILE_PATH FROM IMG_LIST il WHERE l.LAB_STEP_ID = il.POST_ID AND l.BOARD_ID = il.BOARD_ID AND il.IMG_PRIORITY = 1 ) AS POSTER , ( SELECT DISTINCT LISTAGG(FILE_PATH, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY il.IMG_PRIORITY) OVER(PARTITION BY il.POST_ID) FROM IMG_LIST il WHERE l.LAB_STEP_ID = il.POST_ID AND l.BOARD_ID = il.BOARD_ID AND il.IMG_PRIORITY != 1 ) AS FILES FROM LAB_DETAIL_STEP l LEFT OUTER JOIN HASHTABLES h ON l.LAB_ID = h.CONN_ID AND h.BOARD_ID = 20 WHERE l.LAB_ID = #{lab_id} ORDER BY l.LAB_STEP_ID
